entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Flurries or ice pellets beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High 9.
